attributes.action: To not cut back on things that are saving children's lives.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why are you making cuts that save children's lives? Lollipop wardens only get 48 pound per week to do their job and it's a very important job. Members of parliament should cut their own wages, seeing as you get paid three or four times as much as a doctor or nurse. If you want to cut back on your countries spending maybe you should think about how much you and your army overspend and what percentage of the taxes go to you, MPs wages and living expenses.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
